units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets â€” medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

player.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.

units.name: Deadeye
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Pulse
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak immediately on turn 1. Move toward the enemy medic or weakest target. Use shadow_strike when adjacent while cloaked. Use breach to sabotage high-value targets.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.
